sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdegraphics include kamera, kcoloredit, kdvi, kfax, kgamma, kghostview, kiconedit, kooka, kpaint, kpdf, kpovmodeler, kruler, ksnapshot, kuickshow and kview.

sect3.title: kamera
sect3.para: kamera allows you to view and download images on a digital camera.

sect3.title: kcoloredit
sect3.para: kcoloredit is a color pallette editor.

sect3.title: kgamma
sect3.para: kgamma is a simple tool for monitor gamma correction.

sect3.title: kooka
sect3.para: kooka is a raster image scan program.

sect3.title: kpovmodeler
sect3.para: kpovmodeler is a graphical 3D modeler, which can generate scenes for POV-Ray.

sect3.title: ksnapshot
sect3.para: ksnapshot is a screen capture program.
